rules_text:
Each other creature you control that's a Plant, Fungus, Saproling, or Treefolk gets +1/+1.
Reap–{2}{G}: Exile exactly three other cards from your graveyard. When you do, Return Mossy Ulderhulk from your graveyard to your hand. [i](Activate this ability only once each turn and only as a sorcery. It costs {0} if a creature you controlled died this turn.)[/i]
